transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		body as (error as (code as string, message as string)),
		headers as [string,string]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	entity: '/subscriptions/1e42591f-1f0c-4c5a-b7f2-a268f6105ec5/resourceGroups/keshADF_test/providers/Microsoft.DataFactory/factories/KeshWestEurope/pipelines/WebCallPipeline?api-version=2018-06-01',
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'documentPerLine']) ~> source1
source1 derive(body = toString(byName('body')),
		headers = toMap(byName('headers'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
